entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:04 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 12:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 3.8°C
Wind: ENE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High 8 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow and blowing snow this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High 8 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
